attributes.action: make it illegal for a PM to retire mid-term (unless this is due to ill health), without a general election, and be replaced with someone the electorate hasn't chosen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I don't remember anyone asking me if I want Gordon Brown as my Prime Minister, do you?  He's not even the Deputy Prime Minister. If TB is retiring for reasons of ill health, then surely the Deputy PM should step in.  Otherwise if TB wants to leave office for no other reason then he should call a General Election and let the people choose whom they want to lead the country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
